catalog_info.title: Tutorial - Senior Year
catalog_info.notes: Taught by Kathleen Coleman and assistants. May be counted for concentration. Divisible only with permission of the Director of Undergraduate Studies.
catalog_info.description: Tutorial instruction for course credit (in addition to ordinary tutorial instruction) is open only to candidates for honors writing a thesis in their senior year whose applications for such instruction have been approved by the Director of Undergraduate Studies. Part two of a two part series.
